name: European Association of Payment Service Providers for Merchants
goal: The "European Association of Payment Service Providers for Merchants" (EPSM) is an interest representation and information platform of more than 60 European organisations. Voting members are payment network operators, acquirers and other payment service providers for merchants. Among the non-voting members are terminal manufacturers, processing providers and payment schemes.
interests: Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market, Taxation
euInitiatives: PSD2, Interchange Regulation, SEPA Regulation, NIS Directive, AML, GDPR, Cloud Services, Brexit
